strings.Value: "Greatbeasts rough the land again. Everyone blames Mother again. But that is not her! She would have told me!"
"Judging by your words Lamashtu whispers her visions to you like Groetus whispers prophecies to me. Who would have thought that goblin will understand me better than anyone else..."
"Whoever is to blame, I pity the simple folk that will become beasts' prey. They just began forgetting about that terrible Bloom â€” and now it strikes again!"
"Hm... maybe we should start drinking only rain water again? Just as a preventive measure!"
"Such are the Stolen Lands. One disaster follows another, and we never know which ancient evil to blame. There are so many that call this place their home!"
"Such are the Stolen Lands. One disaster follows another, and we never know which ancient evil to blame. There are so many that call this place their home!"
